title: [PAID] [$250] [Help Wanted] Taxes settings – Default tax rates greyed out when go offline
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to https://staging.new.expensify.com/
2. Log in with Expensifail account
3. Create a new workspace
4. Navigate to the workspace editor
5. Navigate to "More Features"
6. Enable the tax toggle
7. Verify that there are two default tax rates, Tax exempt and Tax Rate 1
8. Go offline on your devise

Expected result: Default tax rates are not greyed out when go offline

Actual result: None
html_description:

Go to https://staging.new.expensify.com/ 2. Log in with Expensifail account 3. Create a new workspace 4. Navigate to the workspace editor 5. Navigate to "More Features" 6. Enable the tax toggle 7.
